speciality.title: Best Ovarian Cyst treatment in India

values: Shorter for laparoscopy, longer for laparotomy
Waiting for the spontaneous resolution of a cyst

definition.title: What is an Ovarian Cyst?
definition.content: An ovarian cyst is a fluid-filled sac that develops in or on the surface of an ovary. Most ovarian cysts are harmless and resolve on their own, while some may require treatment if they grow too large, cause pain, or have an increased risk of complications. Treatment options range from conservative management to surgical removal.

treatment.title: Treatment Options
treatment.content: Depending on the size and type of ovarian cyst, as well as the patient's symptoms and age, there are different treatment options available. These include conservative management through observation, and surgical treatments like laparoscopy or laparotomy.
